reviewDescription: I purchased this product at Rs 999 on October 2022 and I am writing this review on 24 January 2024. Its been 1.3 years I am using it, and honestly speaking this is a master piece. At this price this is too good. The sound Quality is like a home theater. The bass quality of the speaker is vey good. It takes around 3 hours to charge and I can use it for around 1.5 months. This is very portable and worth purchasing at this price.

reviewTitle: Performance is as good as the price
reviewDescription: I bought this speaker in October 23. I was very happy with the overall performance. Unfortunately, exactly after 1 year, it became a nuisance. It stopped getting charged. Luckily I found a Zebronics service centre and visited it. The charging port was repaired and the speaker is performing beautifully. Considering the price, the product is very good.

reviewDescription: The soundbox is good but the Aux cable and the charger are pathetic. Zebronics should have provided a better cables. It automatically broke at the bending point after 5-6 months. Now with other cables also it is not charging properly.

reviewTitle: Speaker is really good and the sound quality is pretty clean
reviewDescription: The sound quality is good and exceeds expectation in such a price range. The sound doesn't distort even on full volume. BT connects quickly, AUX is straight forward. FM tuning is little tricky and confusing. USB and AUX cables are low quality and are of short length, so I am using my own AUX and USB charging cable. Overall the product is good.The product packaging was totally damaged, speaker had a small dent and one of the speaker wasn't working properly when it came for the first time. I requested for a replacement and the replaced speaker came clean and works fine. Quick and good service by Zebronics & Amazon India.

Sound quality, build quality is good according to the price. Supplied USB charging cable and aux cable are too short, approximately 1 foot in length.

It has a built in rechargeable battery. It has two input slots. 1. Micro SD card. 2. Usb A. With two speakers It is very handy. It sounds good. Fast forward and Rewind fecility is there. Sound volume controls are there. Bluetooth access is there.

For our hostel we bought it sound quality is good but after 6 months the charge port was broken. For built quality 1üåü. Don't expect high bass if you have budget go for another product. If you want to buy speaker under 1k go for this product but be careful when you charge it.
